scripts.web: SEED_IS_GATEWAY=true SEED_SIGNING_ENABLED=true SEED_BASE_URL=http://localhost:3000 && yarn workspace @shm/web dev
scripts.web:dev: yarn web:prod && SEED_IS_GATEWAY=true SEED_SIGNING_ENABLED=true SEED_BASE_URL=http://localhost:3000 yarn web:start
scripts.web:dev:standalone: yarn web:prod && concurrently -n "BACKEND,WEB" -c "blue,green" -p "[{name}]" "./dev run-backend -- -http.port=53001 -grpc.port=53002 -p2p.port=53000 -data-dir=$PWD/.dev-data/standalone" "SEED_BASE_URL=\"http://localhost:3099\" PORT=3099 SEED_IDENTITY_ENABLED=true SEED_IDENTITY_DEFAULT_ORIGIN=\"http://localhost:3000\" DAEMON_HTTP_URL=http://localhost:53001 VITE_DESKTOP_HTTP_PORT=53001 VITE_DESKTOP_GRPC_PORT=53002 VITE_DESKTOP_P2P_PORT=53000 yarn web:start"
scripts.web:dev:cross-origin: yarn web:prod && concurrently -c "blue,green" -p "[{name}]" "SEED_IDENTITY_ENABLED=true PORT=3099 SEED_BASE_URL=\"http://localhost:3099\" SEED_IDENTITY_DEFAULT_ORIGIN=\"http://localhost:3000\" yarn web:start" "SEED_SIGNING_ENABLED=true yarn web:start"
scripts.ui:build: yarn workspace @shm/ui generate && yarn workspace @shm/ui build
scripts.perf:dash: yarn workspace @shm/perf-web generate-index && yarn workspace @shm/performance-dashboard copy-results && yarn workspace @shm/performance-dashboard dev
scripts.perf:dash:build: yarn workspace @shm/performance-dashboard copy-results && yarn workspace @shm/performance-dashboard build
